The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 29 November is 1,390,923 (2,471.1 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 24 November, there were 98,963 new confirmed cases (175.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 17 November, there were 141,961 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 30% (42,998 fewer cases).
